//@ts-ignore
import packageJSON from "../package.json";
import { PluginInstance } from "./PluginInstance";
import IPlugin from "@gluestack/framework/types/plugin/interface/IPlugin";
import IInstance from "@gluestack/framework/types/plugin/interface/IInstance";
import IManagesInstances from "@gluestack/framework/types/plugin/interface/IManagesInstances";

//Do not edit the name of this class
export class GlueStackPlugin implements IPlugin, IManagesInstances {
  app: any;
  instances: IInstance[];

  constructor(app: any) {
    this.app = app;
    this.instances = [];
  }

  getName(): string {
    return packageJSON.name;
  }

  getVersion(): string {
    return packageJSON.version;
  }

  runBootstrap() {
    console.log(`Booting ${this.getName()}...`);
  }

  getTemplateFolderPath(): string {
    return `${process.cwd()}/node_modules/${this.getName()}/template`;
  }

  async runPostInstall(target: string) {
    return await this.app.createPluginInstance(
      this.getTemplateFolderPath(),
      target,
    );
  }

  createInstance(key: string): IInstance {
    const instance = new PluginInstance(this.app, this, key);
    this.instances.push(instance);
    return instance;
  }

  getInstances(): IInstance[] {
    return this.instances;
  }
}
